name: Momma's Healthy Meatloaf
author: NOLAMom
summary: This is a super healthy and simplified version of a family favorite.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup ketchup, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray a 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir green bell pepper and onion in the hot oil until onion is transparent and bell pepper is softened, 5 to 10 minutes
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, eggs, carrot, zucchini, salt, pepper, and bell pepper mixture in a large bowl; mix well using your hands
Press meat mixture into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, 35 to 40 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
Spread ketchup on the top of the meatloaf and continue baking until bubbling, about 5 minutes more
